chapter.title: Managing Funds Transfer
chapter.para: This chapter helps you with processing funds transfer, making payments from your accounts, and performing transfer inquiries using Opics Portal.

section.title: Transferring Funds between Accounts
section.para: Using Opics Portal, you can transfer funds from one account to another, from a list of available accounts.
In the portal Home page, click Fund Transfer and then under Initiation select Transfer to create an internal fund transfer request. You can select the debit amount and the date for the transfer.

note.para: : If no value date is specified, then it takes the current branch processing date (CASH).

section.para: If the call and notice account is denominated in different currencies, the underlying FX deal price is requested based on the customer, currencies of the accounts, transfer amount, and value date. The FX price is displayed on the entry screen.
On successful completion of the transfer, the portal displays the transaction details, debit and credit deal reference numbers, and (optionally) the underlying FX deal number.

section.title: Making Payments from Accounts
section.para: Using the portal, you can make payments from one particular account, from the list of call and notice accounts.

In the portal Home page, click Fund Transfer and then under Initiation select Payment to create an outgoing fund transfer request. You can specify the amount, value date, and the currency of the payment.

If the payment currency specified is in the account currency then an underlying FX price request is performed based on the two currencies, the customer of the account, the value date, and amount of the payment. The FX price is displayed on the entry screen.
You can either select from a list of standard and usual settlement instructions or can enter the instructions manually.
On successful completion of the payment, the portal displays the transaction details, debit and credit deal reference numbers.

note.para: : Payments from a call and notice liability account generates a decrease to that account, whereas that from an asset account generates an increase to that account.

section.title: Making Payments with Transfers
section.para: Opics Portal also facilitates to make payments with transfers for the call and notice accounts.
In the portal Home page, click Fund Transfer and then under Initiation select Payment with Transfer to create an internal and outgoing fund transfer request.

Here, you can create an unbalanced transfer where the debut amount is greater than the credit amount. If you select to perform one of these transactions, then the remaining balance is made available for the payment as explained above.

tip.para: : The debit amount cannot be less than the credit amount.

section.title: Funds Transfer Inquiry
section.para: Opics Portal provides information about the status, the details, and the history of fund transfers initiated by the user. The list of transfers is confined to those transactions entered on the current processing date.
You can make inquiries on fund transfers as follows:

listitem.para: From the Main Menu, click Fund Transfer and then click FTInquiry.
In the Ccy field, specify the currency of the transfer.
Select the Output Format to display on Screen, or save the results in CSV or Spreadsheet.
Click Search to retrieve a list of records displaying funds transfer in the specified currency.
Click the System ID of a record to view the details of a particular transfer.

tip.para: : You can use wildcards in your search string. For example, type *MYTEXT* to search for the items containing the MYTEXT string.

section.para: Moreover, you can also filter or sort the information returned from the portal on a multi or single column basis.
